title: wordplay üéÆ üí¨
text:
LLM experiments, powered by wordplay.
What started as some (simple) modifications to Andrej Karpathy‚Äôs nanoGPT, has grown into the wordplay project.

Install

Easy:
python3 -m pip install "git+https://github.com/saforem2/wordplay.git"
Development:
git clone https://github.com/saforem2/wordplay
cd wordplay
mkdir v venv
python3 -m venv venv --system-site-packages
source venv/bin/activate
python3 -m pip install -e .
